Class DrawAssist

java.lang.Object
  DrawAssist

public class DrawAssist
extends java.lang.Object

Assists DrawingTool by providing and invoking mutator methods. Manages reader input and pen objects

Version:
(02/12/2016)
Author:
Edward Taylor

Method Summary
 void colourSet(int choice)
          Sets the color of the selected pen
 void createPen(java.lang.String name)
          Creates a new pen and selects it for use unless a pen of that name currently exists in which case it will select that pen
 void deletePen(java.lang.String name)
          Deletes a pen if it exists
 void downPen()
          Puts the selected pen onto the canvas
 java.lang.String getCommand(int position)
          Allows DrawingTool to retrieve commands from the reader
 void initialiseAssist()
          Allows DrawingTool to fill the LinkedList with commands using the reader

          Prints invalid command responses
 boolean isEmpty()
          Returns true if there are no commands
 boolean isSize(int size)
          Returns true if the size entered matches the size of the LinkedList

          Moves the selected pen

          Moves the selected pen to specified coordinates

          Prints the help menu

          Selects a pen for use

          Turns the selected pen
 void turnToPen(java.lang.String secondWord)
